description: Describes an alert. Amazon Lookout for Metrics API actions are eventually consistent. If you do a read operation on a resource immediately after creating or modifying it, use retries to allow time for the write operation to complete.

parameters.name: AlertArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the alert to describe.

nested_items.name: SNSConfiguration
nested_items.description: A configuration for an Amazon SNS channel.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has access to the target SNS topic.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target SNS topic.

nested_items.name: SnsFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the SNS topic.
JSON --- Send JSON alerts with an anomaly ID and a link to the anomaly detail page. This is the default.
LONG_TEXT --- Send human-readable alerts with information about the impacted timeseries and a link to the anomaly detail page. We recommend this for email.
SHORT_TEXT --- Send human-readable alerts with a link to the anomaly detail page. We recommend this for SMS.

nested_items.name: LambdaConfiguration
nested_items.description: A configuration for an AWS Lambda channel.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role that has permission to invoke the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: LambdaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: AlertDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the alert.

nested_items.name: AlertArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the alert.

nested_items.name: AnomalyDetectorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the detector to which the alert is attached.

nested_items.name: AlertName
nested_items.description: The name of the alert.

nested_items.name: AlertSensitivityThreshold
nested_items.description: The minimum severity for an anomaly to trigger the alert.

nested_items.name: AlertType
nested_items.description: The type of the alert.

nested_items.name: AlertStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the alert.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the alert was last modified.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the alert was created.

nested_items.name: AlertFilters
nested_items.description: The configuration of the alert filters, containing MetricList and DimensionFilter.

nested_items.name: MetricList
nested_items.description: The list of measures that you want to get alerts for.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DimensionFilterList
nested_items.description: The list of DimensionFilter objects that are used for dimension-based filtering.

nested_items.name: DimensionName
nested_items.description: The name of the dimension to filter on.

nested_items.name: DimensionValueList
nested_items.description: The list of values for the dimension specified in DimensionName that you want to filter on.
(string) ---
